dcterms:creator: César Quilodrán-Casas
Rossella Arcucci
Pin Wu
Christopher Pain
Yi-Ke Guo
dcterms:description: This dataset is used for simulating urban air pollution and is integrated into a reduced-order model framework to improve forecasting accuracy.
dcterms:title: Urban air pollution simulation dataset

dcterms:creator: D Rhodri Davies
Cian R Wilson
Stephan C Kramer
dcterms:description: A dataset containing a 3D velocity field used for computational modeling of geodynamics, which serves as a basis for fluid dynamics simulations.
dcterms:title: 3D velocity field dataset

dcterms:creator: Jake Lever
Martin Krzywinski
Naomi Altman
dcterms:description: This dataset is utilized for Principal Components Analysis (PCA), which simplifies high-dimensional data for further analysis in the context of urban air pollution forecasting.
dcterms:title: Principal Components Analysis (PCA) dataset

dcterms:creator: Alireza Makhzani
Jonathon Shlens
Navdeep Jaitly
Ian Goodfellow
Brendan Frey
dcterms:description: This dataset is used for training adversarial autoencoders, which are employed to enhance the forecasting capabilities of the model by learning a latent representation of the data.
dcterms:title: Adversarial autoencoder dataset

dcterms:creator: Toby Phillips
Claire E Heaney
Paul N Smith
Christopher C Pain
dcterms:description: This dataset is related to a reduced-order model that utilizes autoencoders for eigenvalue problems, applied in the context of neutron diffusion and urban air pollution simulations.
dcterms:title: Reduced-order model dataset
